attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The undersigned petitions, that:-

Public servants who attend secret meetings during which discussions 'MAY' have the potential to affect public policy shall 'PUBLISH' the full contents of these discussions in accordance with the Freedom of Information Act 2000, in line with the Ministerial Code published in 2005.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
